name: Member Adder
description: A telegram bot to find the files on the channel or group

BOT_TOKEN.description: telegram bot token here you can get it from https://t.me/BotFather

API_ID.description: telegram api id here you can get the value from telegram.org

SUDO.description: Sudoers id. Have same powers as owner. Seprate multiple value with space. Don't leave it blank enter your id if you don't find any sudo

CATEGORY.description: Name of initial category your want to divide the rewards in. Seprate them by space. If you have a value which have space between them seprate them using _

AMOUNT.description: Amount which should be given to the user when someonejoins via their link

CHAT_ID.description: Id of the chat in which you want to add member. Support only one at this time. Pass only one chat id

PREMIUM_CHANNEL.description: Id of the premium channel. Pass 0 if you don't want to set it

COIN_NAME.description: Your custom coin name without emoji

NUMBER_MESSAGE.description: Number of message after which the user will get some coin

DEV.description: User id of the developer who manages the bot and repo

WITHIN.description: Within how many seconds the bot will consider the message as spam

LIMIT.description: Number of message after which next message will considered as spam

TIME.description: For time the user will not get the increment in number message due to spam.Use m for minutes, h for hours and d for days. Don't give space between time and unit give it in same format given below

COIN_MESSAGE.description: Coin given to user when he/she send the required number of message

PREMIUM_COST.description: Cost of premium channel's link. Default to 50
